invoice_number.description: The unique identifier for this invoice

date.description: The date when the invoice was issued (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

total_amount.description: The total amount due on the invoice including currency symbol

vendor_name.description: The name of the company or vendor issuing the invoice

parties.description: The names of all parties involved in this contract

effective_date.description: The date when the contract becomes effective

term_period.description: The duration or term of the contract
